CustomField.description: SOQL query that provides the source records. Applicable when Source Type is SOQL. Max SOQL query length limit: https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.salesforce_app_limits_cheatsheet.meta/salesforce_app_limits_cheatsheet/salesforce_app_limits_platform_soslsoql.htm
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter SOQL query that identifies the records to process. Use aliases with Aggregate functions (COUNT, SUM, MIN, MAX, AVG, etc.) to make them available in the Field Mappings step.
CustomField.label: Source SOQL Query
